name: Legacies Of Extinction
description:
Submission for local Game Jam Novska.

Theme: "Extinction"

Controls: 

W, A, S, D - Move Camera

Mouse Click - Plant, Upgrade, Harvest

Game Description:

The game is based on old Farmville like games. The goal is to get 100 population until the timer runs out. Gather resources like stone and wood. Plant vegetables for food. Build/Upgrade houses to increase population. Build storage to increase resource cap. In case timer runs out, the game is lost.

Credits:

https://d4centertainment.itch.io/

https://spoonproduction36.itch.io/
